summary: When a serial killer interrupts the fun at the swanky Coconut Pete's Coconut Beach Resort--a hedonistic island paradise for swingers--it's up to the club's staff to stop the violence...or at least hide it.
cast: Elena Lyons|Dan Montgomery Jr.|Tanja Reichert|Nat Faxon|Michael Weaver|Kevin Heffernan|Michael Yurchak|Jordan Ladd|Brittany Daniel|Richard Perello|Steve Lemme|Jay Chandrasekhar|Paul Soter|Erik Stolhanske|Lindsay Price|Julio Bekhor|Bill Paxton|Greg Cipes|M.C. Gainey|Ryan Falkner|Fabiana Ferre|Paola Hinojos|Veronica Segura|Samm Levine|Jessica Moreno|Heather Pemble|Benjamin Digby|Jose Cruz|Luis Banderas|Claudia Palacios|Tom Graziano|Alison Raimondi
title: Club Desmadre
